nodes.text: The Red Light Slums was a rundown residential section of the Red Light Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The criminal Bleeder gangs controlled the area, as they did most of the Red Light Sector.
The Red Light Slums appears as part of the Red Light Sector on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
